titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: BINET STAGE - Permitted Codes

stentry.p: Stage A: if platelet count greater than 99 and haemoglobin greater than 99 and 0, 1 or 2 areas of organ enlargement (number of Lymph Node groups plus score 1 for hepatomegaly, 1 for splenomegaly)
Stage B: if platelet count greater than 99 and haemoglobin greater than 99 and 3, 4 or 5 areas of organ enlargement
Stage C: if haemoglobin less than 100 or platelet count less than 100
